SEARCH
Package model

Class MyModelManager

java.lang.Object
model.MyModelManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class MyModelManager extends Object implements Serializable
Manages the core functionality of the VIAPets application, including operations for pets, bookings, customers, and sales, as well as ID generation and settings management. It is a connector between VIAPets class, MyFileHandler, and also XMLHandler
Version:
1.0
Author:
Piotr Junosz
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • MyModelManager

      public MyModelManager()
      Initializes the model manager by loading data from various files into the system. The constructor handles loading the lists of pets, bookings, customers, and sales from their respective binary files and casts the objects to their specific types. It also loads the last used IDs for each entity and sets the booking settings and available slots based on the current date.

    • saveBookingsSettings

      public void saveBookingsSettings(int maxKennelSlots, double bookingPrice)
      Saves the booking settings, including maximum kennel slots and booking price.
      Parameters:
      maxKennelSlots - the maximum number of kennel slots available.
      bookingPrice - the price per booking.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if the settings file cannot be written.

    • loadBookingsSettings

      public void loadBookingsSettings()
      Loads the booking settings from the settings file. If the file is not found, default settings are saved.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if the settings file cannot be read.

    • isThisPeriodAvailable

      public boolean isThisPeriodAvailable(DateInterval dateInterval)
      Checks if a specific period is available for booking.
      Parameters:
      dateInterval - the date range to check for availability
      Returns:
      true if the period is available, false otherwise
